text: My prayers are with the victims of the devastating attack in Uvalde their families and community. We have to do more to end gun violence and protect children.
As we mark Asian Pacific American Heritage Month I'm especially proud to work alongside my @CAPAC colleagues to strive for a more inclusive workforce and economy.

There are a lot of middle class and working class folks who are hurting right now and a couple hundred bucks would make a big difference.Let's pass my windfall tax with @SenWhitehouse on Big Oil and put money back in the pockets of hardworking Americans.
77% of Americans support term limits for Supreme Court Justices. It’s long past time we take this step to rebuild trust and independence in the Supreme Court.

The recent incident of bullying at Coppell Middle School North targeting a young Indian American student is unacceptable and has touched a nerve across the nation.@RepBera @CongressmanRaja @RepJayapal and I wrote a letter to the school's leaders to voice our deep concerns.

It looks like I've been sanctioned and banned by Russia for calling out Putin's atrocities and illegal invasion of Ukraine. That makes me more determined to speak out for human rights and Ukraine’s right to sovereignty.
The US is the only wealthy nation in the world without universal health care. It’s time we pass Medicare for All to guarantee health care as a right not a privilege.

Today we remember Harvey Milk one of the first openly gay elected officials in the United States and honor his legacy of fighting for a world where LGBTQ+ people can live their lives openly as themselves.
We're the most powerful country in the world. We need to deploy our resources so that people have baby formula in the next week. This is about protecting children’s health.

The Build Back Better bill would have been fully paid for & had productive investments. When you have something fully paid for @LHSummers & other economists will tell you that it doesn’t cause inflation because the Fed isn’t increasing money supply by purchasing treasury bonds.
Let's make the wealthiest Americans pay their fair share.
Today Michael Brown should have been celebrating his 26th birthday. My heart is with his family and his community as we honor his life. The fight for justice and accountability continues.
We need a massive investment in this industry to help increase pay and support high-quality home care services.

Home care is the fastest growing sector of the healthcare industry workforce employing over 3 million people and is expected to grow 33% by 2030.Yet low wages are driving extremely high turnover with home care workers making around $29260 per year.

High gas prices aren't just because of Russia's assault on Ukraine –– Big Oil is raking in huge profits while hardworking Americans suffer. Let’s pass my Big Oil windfall tax bill with @SenWhitehouse.

Restricting access to abortion care puts lives in jeopardy – especially for people in low-income communities and communities of color who already face higher health risks. We must keep fighting to protect abortion rights for all.

I was proud to vote yes on the Consumer Fuel Price Gouging Prevention Act –– an historic bill to fight back against Big Oil's greed. Now we need a vote on my windfall profits tax bill with @SenWhitehouse to provide more relief to working families.
192 Republicans voted last night AGAINST emergency funding to address the baby formula shortage. As Dr. Maya Angelou said "When people show you who they are believe them.”
Great news. This is a critical step that will help families get the formula they urgently need.
A huge win that will finally guarantee equal pay for equal work. Thanks to @mPinoe all the women soccer players and advocates who have been fighting for this.

50% of infant formula in the US is purchased by low-income families who rely on WIC benefits. We need to pass The Access to Baby Formula Act to expand formula options for families who rely on these benefits to make sure they aren't left behind.
Losing a job shouldn't mean losing health care coverage. We need Medicare for All.

Parents shouldn’t be scrambling to find the formula they need to feed their kids. I joined @RepMGS and my colleagues in calling on @POTUS to use every tool available to address the supply chain issues and monopolies driving the formula shortage.
